<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Holds solver state and other metadata relevant to each PBQP RA node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/nodemetadata"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/nodemetadata/#aabb3b41c18912cd555ea82127da917e0">NodeMetadata</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/nodemetadata/#ad2d867b3c6a1086374664fdd467b7da4"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/nodemetadata/#ad2d867b3c6a1086374664fdd467b7da4">AllowedRegVector</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/allowedregvector">RegAlloc::AllowedRegVector</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The node&#39;s reduction state. The order in this enum is important,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as it is assumed nodes can only progress up (i.e. towards being</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// optimally reducible) when reducing the graph.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/nodemetadata/#a76792a143d879b2328025dfc48e80e8f"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/nodemetadata/#a76792a143d879b2328025dfc48e80e8f">ReductionState</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">enum</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Unprocessed,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NotProvablyAllocatable,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ConservativelyAllocatable,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OptimallyReducible</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Metadata are computed incrementally. First, update them</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by removing the old cost.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/matrixmetadata">MatrixMetadata</a>&amp; OldMMd = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ad96b7cf3182ce2ba85e5a7a93b12c441">G</a>.getEdgeCosts(EId).getMetadata();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// And update now the metadata with the new cost.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/matrixmetadata">MatrixMetadata</a>&amp; MMd = NewCosts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/mdmatrix/#acd63ba8da2c8d08ff0fc73f840926666">getMetadata</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">    N2Md.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/nodemetadata/#af604de88cfa10f1c5c955d781ee30d7a">handleAddEdge</a>(MMd, !Transpose);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// As the metadata may have changed with the update, the nodes may have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// become ConservativelyAllocatable or OptimallyReducible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">    promote(N1Id, N1Md);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">    promote(N2Id, N2Md);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">private</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> promote(NodeId NId, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/nodemetadata">NodeMetadata</a>&amp; NMd) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ad96b7cf3182ce2ba85e5a7a93b12c441">G</a>.getNodeDegree(NId) == 3) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This node is becoming optimally reducible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">      moveToOptimallyReducibleNodes(NId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NMd.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/nodemetadata/#ae146313afdc8b115519ff4d5a2234729">getReductionState</a>() ==</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">               NodeMetadata::NotProvablyAllocatable &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">               NMd.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/nodemetadata/#a50f35a8eb5e9fdd4484c4946053b67a3">isConservativelyAllocatable</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This node just became conservatively allocatable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">      moveToConservativelyAllocatableNodes(NId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> removeFromCurrentSet(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/regallocsolverimpl/#a882a5d143fa147a161f2f7e12543622e">NodeId</a> NId) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ad96b7cf3182ce2ba85e5a7a93b12c441">G</a>.getNodeMetadata(NId).getReductionState()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NodeMetadata::Unprocessed: </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NodeMetadata::OptimallyReducible:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(OptimallyReducibleNodes.find(NId) !=</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">             OptimallyReducibleNodes.end() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Node not in optimally reducible set.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">      OptimallyReducibleNodes.erase(NId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NodeMetadata::ConservativelyAllocatable:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(ConservativelyAllocatableNodes.find(NId) !=</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">             ConservativelyAllocatableNodes.end() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Node not in conservatively allocatable set.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ConservativelyAllocatableNodes.erase(NId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NodeMetadata::NotProvablyAllocatable:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(NotProvablyAllocatableNodes.find(NId) !=</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlight">             NotProvablyAllocatableNodes.end() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Node not in not-provably-allocatable set.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NotProvablyAllocatableNodes.erase(NId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> moveToOptimallyReducibleNodes(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/regallocsolverimpl/#a882a5d143fa147a161f2f7e12543622e">NodeId</a> NId) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlight">    removeFromCurrentSet(NId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OptimallyReducibleNodes.insert(NId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlight">    G.getNodeMetadata(NId).setReductionState(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NodeMetadata::OptimallyReducible);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> moveToConservativelyAllocatableNodes(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/regallocsolverimpl/#a882a5d143fa147a161f2f7e12543622e">NodeId</a> NId) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlight">    removeFromCurrentSet(NId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ConservativelyAllocatableNodes.insert(NId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><span class="doxyHighlight">    G.getNodeMetadata(NId).setReductionState(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NodeMetadata::ConservativelyAllocatable);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> moveToNotProvablyAllocatableNodes(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/regallocsolverimpl/#a882a5d143fa147a161f2f7e12543622e">NodeId</a> NId) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><span class="doxyHighlight">    removeFromCurrentSet(NId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NotProvablyAllocatableNodes.insert(NId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><span class="doxyHighlight">    G.getNodeMetadata(NId).setReductionState(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NodeMetadata::NotProvablyAllocatable);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> setup() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Set up worklists.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NId : G.nodeIds()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (G.getNodeDegree(NId) &lt; 3)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><span class="doxyHighlight">        moveToOptimallyReducibleNodes(NId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (G.getNodeMetadata(NId).isConservativelyAllocatable())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><span class="doxyHighlight">        moveToConservativelyAllocatableNodes(NId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlight">        moveToNotProvablyAllocatableNodes(NId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute a reduction order for the graph by iteratively applying PBQP</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reduction rules. Locally optimal rules are applied whenever possible (R0,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// R1, R2). If no locally-optimal rules apply then any conservatively</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// allocatable node is reduced. Finally, if no conservatively allocatable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// node exists then the node with the lowest spill-cost:degree ratio is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// selected.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;GraphBase::NodeId&gt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopstrengthreduce-cpp/#a6d827fc34f1b4371a0b7183d3ca5bcac">reduce</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!G.empty() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Cannot reduce empty graph.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/regallocsolverimpl/#a882a5d143fa147a161f2f7e12543622e">NodeId</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graphbase/#a7187d2e408994bd7307a4c8f32f745a8">GraphBase::NodeId</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::vector&lt;NodeId&gt; NodeStack;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Consume worklists.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!OptimallyReducibleNodes.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a23b591c7cb04a054d9cafd9bf58e7757">NodeSet::iterator</a> NItr = OptimallyReducibleNodes.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a8a045d250952c0867382a9840ee18fdf">begin</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/regallocsolverimpl/#a882a5d143fa147a161f2f7e12543622e">NodeId</a> NId = &#42;NItr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><span class="doxyHighlight">        OptimallyReducibleNodes.erase(NItr);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NodeStack.push&#95;back(NId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (G.getNodeDegree(NId)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 1:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pbqp/#a8e8a0cd1e0e21531b3b6cf88878ee77b">applyR1</a>(G, NId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 2:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pbqp/#a7d21d6d08fe746df3e5621b4703523ea">applyR2</a>(G, NId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">: <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Not an optimally reducible node.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!ConservativelyAllocatableNodes.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Conservatively allocatable nodes will never spill. For now just</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// take the first node in the set and push it on the stack. When we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// start optimizing more heavily for register preferencing, it may</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// would be better to push nodes with lower &#39;expected&#39; or worst-case</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register costs first (since early nodes are the most</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// constrained).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a23b591c7cb04a054d9cafd9bf58e7757">NodeSet::iterator</a> NItr = ConservativelyAllocatableNodes.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a8a045d250952c0867382a9840ee18fdf">begin</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/regallocsolverimpl/#a882a5d143fa147a161f2f7e12543622e">NodeId</a> NId = &#42;NItr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ConservativelyAllocatableNodes.erase(NItr);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NodeStack.push&#95;back(NId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><span class="doxyHighlight">        G.disconnectAllNeighborsFromNode(NId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!NotProvablyAllocatableNodes.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a23b591c7cb04a054d9cafd9bf58e7757">NodeSet::iterator</a> NItr = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0b1373fa0f76edbe1c0999d7d207c9c4">llvm::min&#95;element</a>(NotProvablyAllocatableNodes,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                   SpillCostComparator(G));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/regallocsolverimpl/#a882a5d143fa147a161f2f7e12543622e">NodeId</a> NId = &#42;NItr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NotProvablyAllocatableNodes.erase(NItr);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NodeStack.push&#95;back(NId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><span class="doxyHighlight">        G.disconnectAllNeighborsFromNode(NId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NodeStack;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"></CodeLine>
